vote.text: Amendment SA 3982 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3982 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hatch. (consideration: CR 10/7/2004 S10609; text: CR 10/7/2004 S10609) To make a technical amendment.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3982 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hatch.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3982 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
